mapper.select: SELECT A.SID, A.CREATED_DT, A.MILL_SHEET_NO, A.ZCHARG, A.SPECS, B.MILL_SHEET_TYPE, B.SPLIT_MAX_VALUE, A.ZCHEHAO, C.ZCPMC, A.ZJISHU_UNIT, (select distinct name1 from MILL_CUSTOMER where KUNNR = B.ZKUNNR) AS ZKUNNR, (select distinct name1 from MILL_CUSTOMER where KUNNR = B.ZKUNWE) AS ZKUNWE, A.ZLPH, B.SURPLUS_BATCH, A.SURPLUS_ZLOSMENGE AS ZLOSMENGE, A.SURPLUS_ZJISHU AS ZJISHU FROM WARRANTY.MILL_COIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HOSTS B ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = B.MILL_SHEET_NO LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HEAD C ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = C.MILL_SHEET_NO WHERE A.MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.SID, A.CREATED_DT, A.MILL_SHEET_NO, A.ZCHARG, A.SPECS, B.MILL_SHEET_TYPE, B.SPLIT_MAX_VALUE, A.ZCHEHAO, C.ZCPMC, A.ZJISHU_UNIT, (select distinct name1 from MILL_CUSTOMER where KUNNR = B.ZKUNNR) AS ZKUNNR, (select distinct name1 from MILL_CUSTOMER where KUNNR = B.ZKUNWE) AS ZKUNWE, A.ZLPH, B.SURPLUS_BATCH, A.ZJISHU, A.ZLOSMENGE, A.SURPLUS_ZJISHU, A.SURPLUS_ZLOSMENGE FROM WARRANTY.MILL_COIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HOSTS B ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = B.MILL_SHEET_NO LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HEAD C ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = C.MILL_SHEET_NO WHERE A.MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ZCHARG= #{zcharg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SPECS = #{specs}
SELECT ZCHEHAO, ZLPH, ZCHARG, SPECS, ZJISHU, ZLOSMENGE, SURPLUS_ZJISHU, SURPLUS_ZLOSMENGE, MILL_SHEET_NO FROM WARRANTY.MILL_COIL_INFO WHERE MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT DISTINCT SPECS FROM WARRANTY.MILL_COIL_INFO WHERE MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ZCHEHAO, ZCHARG, SPECS, ZJISHU, ZLOSMENGE, SURPLUS_ZJISHU, SURPLUS_ZLOSMENGE, MILL_SHEET_NO FROM WARRANTY.MILL_COIL_INFO WHERE MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ZCHARG= #{zcharg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SPECS = #{specs}

SELECT A.ZCHEHAO, A.ZCHARG, A.SPECS, A.ZJISHU, A.ZLOSMENGE, A.SURPLUS_ZJISHU, A.SURPLUS_ZLOSMENGE, A.MILL_SHEET_NO FROM WARRANTY.MILL_COIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HOSTS B ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = B.MILL_SHEET_NO WHERE A.ZCHARG= #{zcharg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.STATE NOT IN ('DISSUSED')

SELECT A.MILL_SHEET_NO AS hh, A.SPECS AS specs, A.ZLOSMENGE AS originalWeight FROM WARRANTY.MILL_COIL_INFO A WHERE A.MILL_SHEET_NO= #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ZCHARG= #{zcharg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT MILL_SHEET_NO, ZCHARG FROM MILL_COIL_INFO WHERE ZCHARG = #{zcharg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: SID, ZCHEHAO, ZLPH, ZCHARG, SPECS, ZDIAMETER, ZTHICK, ZWIDTH, ZLENGTH, ZJISHU, ZLOSMENGE, ZJISHU_UNIT, ZMEINS, ZDCZT, ZJHZT, MILL_SHEET_NO, ZBMJD, ZBZFS, ZTSBZ, ZHDPC, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, VERSION
mapper.select: SELECT ZCHARG, MILL_SHEET_NO FROM MILL_COIL_INFO where MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into MILL_COIL_INFO (SID, ZCHEHAO, ZLPH, ZCHARG, SPECS, ZDIAMETER, ZTHICK, ZWIDTH, ZLENGTH, ZJISHU, ZLOSMENGE, ZJISHU_UNIT, ZMEINS, ZDCZT, ZJHZT, MILL_SHEET_NO, ZBMJD, ZBZFS, ZTSBZ, ZHDPC, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, VERSION) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zchehao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zlph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zcharg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdiameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zthick,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zwidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zlength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zjishu,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zlosmenge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zjishuUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zmeins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdczt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjhzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbmjd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ztsbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhdpc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update MILL_COIL_INFO
ZCHEHAO = #{zchehao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZLPH = #{zlph,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZCHARG = #{zcharg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPECS = #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDIAMETER = #{zdiameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZTHICK = #{zthick,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZWIDTH = #{zwidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZLENGTH = #{zlength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZJISHU = #{zjishu,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZLOSMENGE = #{zlosmenge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZJISHU_UNIT = #{zjishuUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZMEINS = #{zmeins,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDCZT = #{zdczt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJHZT = #{zjhzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZBMJD = #{zbmjd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZBZFS = #{zbzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZTSBZ = #{ztsbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZHDPC = #{zhdpc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update MILL_COIL_INFO set ZCHEHAO = #{zchehao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZLPH = #{zlph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZCHARG = #{zcharg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECS = #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDIAMETER = #{zdiameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZTHICK = #{zthick,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZWIDTH = #{zwidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZLENGTH = #{zlength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZJISHU = #{zjishu,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZLOSMENGE = #{zlosmenge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZJISHU_UNIT = #{zjishuUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZMEINS = #{zmeins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDCZT = #{zdczt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJHZT = #{zjhzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBMJD = #{zbmjd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBZFS = #{zbzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZTSBZ = #{ztsbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHDPC = #{zhdpc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
